br.ufsm.psniffstat.thread

Class JNetPcap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • br.ufsm.psniffstat.thread.JNetPcap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class JNetPcap
extends Thread
    JNetPcap is the wrapper class which allows sniffer threads to execute libpcap actions based on configured filters
    Author:
    Tulkas
